routePlanId.description: A unique identifier for the route plan.

planDescription.description: A detailed description of the route plan.
planDescription.value: Weekly schedule covering all customers with preferences for mornings and weekdays

activeFrom.description: The start date when the route plan becomes active, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

activeTo.description: The end date when the route plan is no longer active, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

scheduledRoutes.description: A list of scheduled routes within the active period.

date.description: The date of the scheduled route, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

locations.description: A list of location IDs included in the route.

estimatedTime.description: The estimated time required to complete the route.
